issue.title: Low frame rates on sensors with 1.8.6/2.6.5

content.raw:
I believe Brian tested only one topic subscription at a time. I will try testing multiple subscriptions to verify the publishing rate.

On my desktop with the latest debs, subscribing to `/sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw` and `/multisense_sl/laser/scan` caused the laser rate to drop to 30 Hz. I will test this on a Softlayer machine next.
content.html:
I believe Brian tested only one topic subscription at a time. I will try testing multiple subscriptions to verify the publishing rate.

On my desktop with the latest debs, subscribing to /sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw and /multisense_sl/laser/scan caused the laser rate to drop to 30 Hz. I will test this on a Softlayer machine next.
